Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻

There he talked about our company, its history and the obstacles a startup has to overcome. Afterwards he held a Q&A session and the students were able to mine some Beercoins.  Prost🍻

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: Our ICO has ended. Unfortunately we weren't able to reach our soft cap. This however isn't to much of a setback since we were able to acquire partner brewerys and new investors during the past weeks. If you have lost your faith in Beerchain you can return your Beercoin to the senders adress and write a E-mail (from the account you used to buy Beercoins during the ICO). You will be able to do so until the 31 of July. Apart from that we are still working hard on our vision of a beer-based cryptocurrency and will use the money we collected to achieve our goal of doing so. Thanks to everybody who believes in us.  Prost🍻

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: We are happy to announce our first cooperation with a brewery based in germany!  The Von Freude craft brewery from Hamburg was founded in 2013 and has become one of the leading India Pale Ale producers in germany since then. They are constantly developing new varieties of beer and they are exporting their products all over the world. For more information about their Business you can visit their Website here: http://vonfreude.com/  They will start printing the Beercoin codes in their bottelcaps as soon as possible. We have to sort out a minor problem with the bottling system and we are good to go. Expect some news on it in the next couple of weeks!  Prost🍻

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: Great News everybody! Our technical department worked excessively on our new app during the last few weeks and now it's finally here! The Beercoin Scanner app is available for  Android and  finally also for iOS. Additionaly we will attend the "Beer Pong und Gründercafé mit Tobias Meyer von Beerchain Event" this thursday where you will be able to actually use the app to scan codes and spend the received Beercoins to buy beer!  https://www.facebook.com/events/182343795990866/?notif_t=aymt_upsell_tip&notif_id=1538900963745229  So if you happen to be in bavaria this thursday swing by and mine some Beercoins.

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: Beercoin The beer-based cryptocurrency  We are Beerchain, creating the beer-based cryptocurrency Beercoin.  The beer market is a billion-dollar industry which has not seen many innovations in recent years and is currently decreasing in volume in many parts of the world. While the consumer base is shrinking a lot of new competition, in form of craft beer breweries, is trying to find a solid foothold in the market.  With our project we want to offer breweries a way to fight for their market share with the pinnacle of modern technology. Participating breweries can offer their consumers a beer, which not only tastes great, but enables the consumer to mine a cryptocurrency with it.  To help our Beercoin cryptocurrency taking off, we provide an interface to users to not only donate, but also use Beercoins to buy more beer. Besides breweries, bars and stores can participate in our project as well and consumers can therefore mine and spend Beercoins at their local favorite places.  If you like the idea you can visit our website and give the whitepaper a read. Website: https://www.beerchain.technology  Introduction Video (1 minute) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W_4nNjrlck0  Prototype App https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.beerchain.demo https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9MWD811C6BQH  Social Media https://www.facebook.com/beerchain.technology https://twitter.com/beerchaintech https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W_4nNjrlck0 https://www.instagram.com/beerchain.technology https://medium.com/@BeerchainTech https://www.reddit.com/r/beerchain https://steemit.com/@beerchaintech https://www.linkedin.com/company/beerchaintechnology https://t.me/beerchaintechnology https://disqus.com/by/beerchain  ICO started on May 18 https://www.beerchain.technology/ico

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: thanks for pointing this missing information out . ( we will need to make it clearer in the whitepaper.)  If the cap is not scanned their will be simply no tokens send. Since the value of a single token is linked to the value a scan generates (data/ad revenue) it makes no difference for the users participating, if a code is scanned or not.  and yes it will be a unique code for every bottle.

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: Hello everyone,  we are still alive and a lot of things happened. After our December airdrop, we developed a demo app that you can download for Android and Windows. There is an iOS version, but Apple doesn't allow demo applications in the AppStore... https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.beerchain.demo https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9MWD811C6BQH  If you don't want to download the app, you can see it in action in our YouTube video that explains the Beercoin concept in one minute. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W_4nNjrlck0  To continue development we need infrastructure. And to get infrastructure we need money. Therefore our ICO takes place on May 18. Check the details on our website. https://www.beerchain.technology/ico/  The German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority approved the ICO. We are a trustworthy German company that will use the money to deliver that we promise.  Beerchain

Author: dzkrb1966
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: Do you have a draft only for beer? "With our project, we want to offer breweries the opportunity to compete for their market share with the top of modern technology.The participating breweries can offer their consumers beer that is not only delicious, but also allows the consumer to extract crypto currency with it." But, it seems to me there is some problem here. Varieties of beer already numbered in the hundreds, and famous brands do not need further promotion. Is there any point in investing in beer?

Author: johnleema
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: We are the Bavarian start-up that created the first and only beer-based cryptocurrency based on Ethereum.

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: As the name implies, we focus on beer only. It is simply much easier to focus on a single product category in marketing. If you watch our video, for example, do you think it would be that much fun if we were trying to explain a generic bonus point system instead? "Varieties of beer already numbered in the hundreds" is the point! There is increasing competition, while the beer market is shrinking overall. As breweries cannot get new customer, they have to take those of the competition by distinguishing themselves in an eye-catching way. We want to offer them a tool to do exactly that.

Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: On May 31, we will be at UNCHAIN in Hamburg, Germany, an international Bitcoin and blockchain convention!  You cannot buy Beer with Beercoins yet, to answer the question. However, of you visit our booth, you can get free beer sponsored by the brewery Kehrwieder Kreativbrauerei who likes our idea! Granted, you will need a convention ticket for the free beer. If you want to buy one, however, you can use our special code to get a discount of 20%: UC18D20  If you decide to join us, you can also be among the first people receiving Beercoins via bottle caps!  https://unchain.hamburg

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: The Unchain Convention in Hamburg is over and we are back home. Needlessly to say that we had a blast and were able to meet a lot of people and establish new contacts.  Check out Twitter for many interesting insights on the convention: https://twitter.com/UNCHAIN_Con

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: During our time in Hamburg we participated in the Unchain pitch competition. Apart from us multiple other IT companys took part and competed agains us.  The jury consisted of Erik Voorhees (CEO Shapeshift), Tim Reheder (Earlybird VC), and Moritz Schildt (Co-founder of coinIX).  Apparently our CEO did a good job at convincing the jury of our ideas, because at the end we reached the 2nd place!  Check out Twitter or Facebook for more insights on the convention: https://twitter.com/UNCHAIN_Con                                                                                                     https://www.facebook.com/beerchain.technology/

Author: Beerchain
Title: 🍺🍺🍺 [ANN][ICO] Beercoin: The beer-based cryptocurrency 🍻
Body: Just a quick reminder that our ICO is still running which means you can still buy Beercoins for an unbeatable price and become part of the Beerchain community!  Just fill in our short registration form and further payment instructions will be provided via mail.  You can either use ether and send it to our sales contract or get Beercoins via PayPal.  The exchange rate for a single Beercoin (BCBC) is 1 BCBC = 0.000006 ETH or ~ 1 BCBC = 0.004 USD.  Link to our website: https://www.beerchain.technology/ico/
